This morning, the Ho Chi Minh City Department of Health

at Can Gio district hospital.
This is good news for  Many patients receive
dialysis here because they no longer have to go
to hospitals in the city center,
saving time and money.
Le Van Thinh hospital is the first unit

Phong Hoa frost is the name of the
erosion phenomenon that causes soil and rock to fall due to
the process of constant thawing and refreezing.  The
scientific world predicts that this phenomenon
will become more and more frequent due to
climate change
when falling snow turns into water, which
seeps into the cracks of the mountain slopes and
lingers there in winter or at
night.  The temperature drops below zero and
this water freezes, its volume
increases and cracks widen.
This process repeats each time the snow melts.
Each subsequent freeze causes the
cracks to continue to widen until the  When
these cracks become too large, the
adhesion caused by the ice formation eventually
disappears, causing the rock blocks to separate, causing
soil and rock to fall. Areas in contact with the skeleton
often exceed the zero threshold with
warming.  Globally this condition may
occur more often in increasingly
high places. A Russian cosmetologist and stylist
has found a
completely new method to lighten and condition hair using
special ingredients of  This method
is
goat manure. Mr. Alexander Danil of the city of
Pavlovski Posat said
his special hair masks are made from
amaranth manure along with many other products to
remove the hair that is damaged if only compost is used.
It won't be effective, so
we add a Lipid mask to open the
cuticle for all the substances to penetrate the
hair. Oils are also essential, such as
shea oil, maa oil, these all have a
smell but not too much.  Many customers
commented that this method is highly effective and the
hair has almost no smell. After
testing it, I was a bit skeptical at first.
But after trying this treatment method, the
hair texture has improved more and
more.  thicker Alexander
plans to continue experimenting with
other organic ingredients in the future.

on their children's marriage,
